history.content: "All decisions will be sent out by the posted notification date (Monday, November 30th).  If you have any additional questions regarding your application, please email changeofcollege@berkeley.edu."

I sent this question to ESS, but you may wish to just contact them directly if timing is important! Will update you if I get an answer shortly. Since it is the day before a holiday, many offices are closing early. Happy Turkey Day!

Hello,

In October I submitted a Change of College Application at ESS for admission into EECS from L&S. The Change of College Page states that notification should be sent in the period November 1 - 30.

Could someone confirm that the admission notification has not yet been sent? I never got confirmation that I submitted an application (the person at ESS just took my file of documents). Will notification indeed be sent before December? I need to know before my TeleBears appointment on December 4.

Thanks!
history.subject: Change of College Application Notification
